title: Police Investigate Murder in Lewisdale
body:
On March 31, 2012, at approximately 12:29 a.m.,
patrol officers responded to 20 and Amherst Street for the report
of a shooting.  After canvassing the area,
officers discovered Flores-Quintanilla lying in the 2000 block of Woodberry
Street, suffering from trauma to his body. 
Flores-Quintanilla, of the 100 Block of North Gordon Street, Alexandria,
Virginia, was transported to a local hospital where he was pronounced dead.  Detectives are working to identify the
suspect(s) and establish a motive in this case. 
The investigation is ongoing.Anyone with information about
this case is asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s
Homicide Unit at 301-772-4925.  Callers wishing to remain anonymous may
call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411 TIPS (8477), text “PGPD plus your message” to
CRIMES (274637) on your cell phone or go to http://www.princegeorgescountymd.gov/police/
and submit a tip online.
